<title level="1" right="Rules">[Rituals](/Rules.aspx?ID=1444)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 240 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Rituals take much longer to cast than most spells and can be performed by anyone who is skilled enough, not just spellcasters. The rules for casting rituals appear [here](/Rules.aspx?ID=777). 
</column>

</column>

</row>
